speaker: President.
english: President. Thank you very much, Mr Špidla, for validating the old saying, ‘It’s easier said than done.’ As you mentioned, however, Parliament and the Commission will of course work together to bridge this gap.
original: President. Thank you very much, Mr Špidla, for validating the old saying, ‘It’s easier said than done.’ As you mentioned, however, Parliament and the Commission will of course work together to bridge this gap.
